√gur 'greet'

present: [6.] guráte etc. V.+  guráti etc.  

perfect: jugure  jugurat  juguryās  juguryā́t  

aorist: [1.] gūrta   -- [5.] aguriṣṭa  

[future: guriṣyate  guritā  ]

verbal: gūrtá V.+  gūrṇa S.+  -gū́rya V.+  -gurya  

secondary: intensive: járgurāṇa   -- causative: gūraya-  

derivatives: -gur  -guraṇa C.  gūraṇa C.  gūrtí RV.  -goraṇa C.  -gūrayitṛ C.  jugurváṇi RV.  

Doubtless a secondary form of √1gṛ.
